               <div class="txtNew" data-packed="true" id="comp-jefkc3y7" style="top:1045px;bottom:;left:19px;right:;width:609px;height:auto;position:absolute">
                <p class="font_7">
                 St Petroc's Preparatory School &amp; Early Years, in Bude, sits a short walking distance from the beautiful North Cornwall coastline.
                </p>
                <p class="font_7">
                </p>
                <p class="font_7">
                 We provide an outstanding education for girls and boys from Reception to Year 6. Our Early Years setting takes children from 3 months old to 4 years old and is one of the most popular in the area.
                </p>
                <p class="font_7">
                </p>
                <p class="font_7">
                 Please enjoy finding out more on our website and seeing why we are so proud of St Petroc's. Better still, do give us a ring to book a tour of the school or simply pop in and see what makes St Petroc's so special!
                </p>
                <p class="font_7">
                </p>

         </span>
        </h5>
       </div>
